SET(MAJOR 2)
SET(MINOR 1)
SET(REVISION 0.1)
SET(NAME p8-platform)
SET(PACKAGE ${NAME}-${MAJOR}.${MINOR}.${REVISION})

EXTERNALPROJECT_ADD(${NAME}
    URL https://github.com/Pulse-Eight/platform/archive/${PACKAGE}.tar.gz TIMEOUT 30
    INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}
    CMAKE_ARGS -G ${CMAKE_GENERATOR} ${EXTRA_OPTS} -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE} -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<INSTALL_DIR> -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE}
)
